column4: January 1st... seems like the perfect time to upgrade to edgy
connect in what way ? I know of at least 2 dozen I can use
i mean like use it to control the comp :P
does ubuntu automatically install the drivers for graphics card, mainboard and so on, or i have to do that myself
what video card do you have ?
enable all repos and fetch restricted-modules for your kernel.. that includes the nvidia closed source driver, and you're all set
go to system -> synaptic and search for restricted-modules
